episodeTitle: Rescue Our Friends! A Bond Among Foes Sworn with Fists!
episodeTitleJapanese: 仲間を救え！拳に誓った敵同士の絆！
episodeTitleRomanized: Nakama o Sukue! Kobushi ni Chikatta Teki Dōshi no Kizuna!
description: The Rocketman successfully departs Water 7 and heads out to sea. Luffy rescues Chimney from falling off during the train's acceleration. Iceburg reflects on his reunion with Franky four years ago, revealing their history involving Tom's legacy and the Pluton blueprints. Paulie reveals to the other Galley-La carpenters that CP9 members are responsible for the attack on Iceburg. The Straw Hat Pirates, Franky Family, and Galley-La Company form an alliance to rescue their friends.

events.title: Rocketman Departs Water 7
events.description: The Rocketman sea train successfully departs from Water 7, piloted by Kokoro, carrying the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies toward Enies Lobby. The train accelerates rapidly as it connects with the sea tracks.
events.significance: Marks the beginning of the journey to Enies Lobby to rescue Robin and Franky from CP9. This is the moment when the rescue mission officially begins.

quotes.text: Hold on tight! This train doesn't have any brakes!
quotes.speaker: Kokoro
quotes.context: Warning the passengers about the Rocketman's uncontrollable speed

events.title: Chimney and Gonbe Discovered as Stowaways
events.description: Chimney and her pet rabbit Gonbe are discovered on the front of the Rocketman train, much to Kokoro's shock. She thought they had stayed behind with Iceburg.
events.significance: Adds comic relief and shows Chimney's determination to be part of the rescue mission. Her presence becomes important later in the arc.

quotes.text: Chimney! What are you doing here?! I thought you stayed with Iceburg!
quotes.speaker: Kokoro
quotes.context: Kokoro's shock at discovering her granddaughter as a stowaway

events.title: Luffy Rescues Chimney from Falling
events.description: As the Rocketman accelerates dramatically upon connecting with the sea tracks, Chimney and Gonbe are sent flying off the train. Luffy stretches his arms and catches them both, saving them from falling into the sea.
events.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's quick reflexes and his protective nature toward allies, even children who stowed away. Shows his natural heroism.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Catching Chimney and Gonbe as they fly off the train

events.title: Flashback: Franky Returns to Water 7
events.description: Iceburg has a flashback to four years ago when Franky (still calling himself Cutty Flam) returned to Water 7. Kalifa informed Iceburg that someone named 'Cutty Flam' wanted to see him, shocking Iceburg who thought Franky had died.
events.significance: This flashback reveals crucial backstory about Franky and Iceburg's relationship and sets up the revelation about the Pluton blueprints. It explains why Iceburg has been protecting the blueprints and his connection to Franky.

quotes.text: Cutty Flam? That's impossible... I thought he was dead!
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Iceburg's shock upon learning Franky is alive

events.title: Flashback: Franky Shows His Cyborg Body
events.description: In the flashback, Franky meets Iceburg at night and reveals his new cyborg body. He explains that the Sea Train mangled his original body, forcing him to rebuild himself using spare parts from an abandoned ship.
events.significance: Reveals how Franky became a cyborg and survived his attempt to stop the Sea Train from taking Tom away. This explains his current appearance and abilities.

quotes.text: The Sea Train wrecked my body, so I had to make myself a new one!
quotes.speaker: Franky
quotes.context: Explaining his cyborg transformation to Iceburg

events.title: Flashback: Argument About Tom's Legacy
events.description: Franky angrily confronts Iceburg for building ships for the World Government after what they did to Tom. Iceburg counters by reminding Franky that it was Franky's weapons that caused the incident with Tom in the first place, saying he's never forgiven Franky even though Tom did.
events.significance: Reveals the deep emotional wounds and guilt both characters carry from Tom's execution. Shows the complexity of their relationship and their different ways of honoring Tom's legacy.

quotes.text: How can you build ships for the World Government after what they did to Tom?!
quotes.speaker: Franky
quotes.context: Franky confronting Iceburg about his work

quotes.text: Don't forget who made the weapons that caused all this! I've never forgiven you, even if Tom did!
quotes.speaker: Iceburg

events.title: Flashback: Iceburg Entrusts Pluton Blueprints to Franky
events.description: Iceburg gives the Pluton blueprints to Franky and tells him to stop using the name 'Cutty Flam' because the World Government will target him. He urges Franky to leave Water 7 alive. In tears, Iceburg admits he's glad Franky survived.
events.significance: This is a major revelation about the Ancient Weapon Pluton blueprints, explaining why Franky was targeted by CP9. It shows the deep bond between Iceburg and Franky despite their argument, and sets up future events regarding the blueprints.

quotes.text: Take these blueprints and get out of Water 7. Don't call yourself Cutty Flam anymore - the World Government will be after you!
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Entrusting the Pluton blueprints to Franky

quotes.text: I'm just... I'm just glad you're alive.
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Breaking down in tears after their argument

events.title: Paulie Reveals CP9 Members as Culprits
events.description: Back on the Rocketman, Paulie reveals to Tilestone and Lulu that the real culprits behind Iceburg's attempted assassination are their fellow Galley-La workers: Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno.
events.significance: This revelation shocks the Galley-La foremen and solidifies their motivation to join the rescue mission. It shows how deeply CP9's infiltration has affected everyone at Galley-La.

quotes.text: The ones who tried to kill Iceburg... they were Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno!
quotes.speaker: Paulie
quotes.context: Revealing the CP9 infiltrators to his fellow foremen

events.title: Tilestone and Lulu's Shocked Reaction
events.description: Tilestone and Lulu are greatly surprised by Paulie's revelation, having believed the culprits were Michael and Hoichael from the Water 7 backstreets instead of their trusted coworkers.
events.significance: Shows the shock and disbelief at discovering trusted allies were actually government agents. Adds emotional weight to the betrayal felt by the Galley-La workers.

quotes.text: What?! But we thought it was Michael and Hoichael!
quotes.speaker: Tilestone
quotes.context: Shocked disbelief at learning the truth about CP9

events.title: Three-Way Alliance Formed
events.description: Luffy speaks up and proposes that despite their previous conflicts, the Straw Hat Pirates, Franky Family, and Galley-La Company should form an alliance since they share a common enemy. Paulie and Zambai agree, and Luffy declares that they will fight as one to achieve their goal.
events.significance: This is a pivotal moment that unites former enemies under a common cause. It establishes the coalition that will storm Enies Lobby and demonstrates Luffy's leadership and ability to bring people together.

quotes.text: Even though we fought before, we all have the same enemy now. Let's form an alliance!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Proposing the alliance to rescue Robin and Franky

quotes.text: For now, we fight as one. Together, we'll achieve our goal!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Declaring the alliance after Paulie and Zambai agree

quotes.text: For now, we fight as one. Together, we'll achieve our goal!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Declaring the alliance between Straw Hats, Franky Family, and Galley-La

quotes.text: I'm just... I'm just glad you're alive.
quotes.speaker: Iceburg
quotes.context: Breaking down emotionally after entrusting the Pluton blueprints to Franky

quotes.text: The ones who tried to kill Iceburg... they were Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno!
quotes.speaker: Paulie
quotes.context: Revealing the CP9 members to the other Galley-La foremen

themes.description: Despite being former enemies, the Straw Hat Pirates, Franky Family, and Galley-La Company unite under a common cause to rescue their friends.
themes.symbolism: The Rocketman train itself represents the bringing together of different groups on a single vehicle heading toward the same destination.

themes.description: The flashback explores how both Iceburg and Franky carry guilt and pain from Tom's execution, but deal with it in different ways.
themes.symbolism: The Pluton blueprints represent Tom's legacy and the burden both his apprentices carry.

themes.description: The revelation that trusted Galley-La workers were actually CP9 agents highlights the theme of betrayal, while the alliance formation shows trust being rebuilt.
themes.symbolism: The discovery of CP9's true identities shatters the trust within Galley-La Company.

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy demonstrates his leadership by recognizing the need for unity and successfully bringing together three groups that were recently in conflict.
keyActions: Rescues Chimney and Gonbe from falling off the Rocketman
Proposes the alliance between former enemies
Declares their united goal to rescue Robin and Franky
quotes: For now, we fight as one. Together, we'll achieve our goal!

characterSpotlights.development: Through flashbacks, we see Iceburg's emotional complexity - his anger at Franky, his relief that Franky survived, and his willingness to entrust the Pluton blueprints to protect him.
keyActions: Meets with Franky four years ago
Argues with Franky about Tom's legacy
Breaks down in tears expressing relief that Franky is alive
quotes: I'm just... I'm just glad you're alive.

characterSpotlights.development: Paulie takes on the difficult task of revealing the shocking truth about CP9 to his fellow Galley-La workers and commits to joining the rescue mission.
keyActions: Reveals CP9 members as the true culprits
Agrees to the alliance with the Straw Hats and Franky Family
quotes: The ones who tried to kill Iceburg... they were Lucci, Kaku, Kalifa, and Blueno!

mangaDifferences.difference: The episode adapts two separate manga chapters (358 and 366), combining them into a single cohesive episode with extended scenes.
The anime extends the flashback scenes between Iceburg and Franky with additional emotional moments and dialogue.

trivia.fact: This episode marks the first use of 'Asu wa Kuru Kara' by Tohoshinki (TVXQ!) as the ending theme. The ending animation focuses on Nico Robin's backstory.

sources.title: Asu wa Kuru Kara - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: The Rocketman sea train was designed by Tom's Workers but deemed too dangerous for public use due to its uncontrollable speed.
This episode adapts content from two manga chapters that are eight chapters apart (358 and 366), showing how the anime sometimes reorganizes material for pacing.
Akemi Okamura, who voices Nami, also voices Gonbe in the Japanese version.
